trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Lawrenceville
There were no other sightings in Lawrenceville on or around October 23rd 2012
Summary: I saw a flashing red & white light with 2 white lights on the right side slowly moving
divs: Sighting DetailsI was laying down on my bed watching tv, and my bed is right next to my window which blinds were open. I notice a red flashing light outside in the sky, but I first I didn't really pay much attention because there's alot of helicopter & airplane sightings around my area. I then realize the lights are flashing very low & helicopters that usually pass by are far away & in clouds so I knew it couldn't be that nor an airplane. So I open my blinds to see more clearly outside & I see a red flashing light with 2 white glowing lights on the right side the lights looked as if they were around a plate shaped object. I was shocked at what I was seeing so I lay back down & I still see that the lights were moving very slowly. As I saw it moving i heard kind of a vibrating buzzing noise. It wasn't that loud though, it sounded a little distant. While I was seeing the unidentified object about 500ft under the horizon line across the street & I see it move slowly toward my direction & goes behind my house. I couldn't really see the much of the size or shape because it was dark outside.
